original_text: David thought carefully about what King Achish's servants were saying. It caused him to be very afraid of Achish, king of Gath.
korean_text: 다윗이 이 말을 그의 마음에 두고 가드 왕 아기스를 심히 두려워하여

sentences.original_text: about what King Achish's servants were saying
sentences.korean_translation: 아기스 왕의 종들이 말하는 것에 대하여

sentences.original_text: It caused him to be very afraid
